title: return to older version
content:
I have Thunderbird in 3 computers. I downloaded the upgrade this week and a lot of changes took place. Then I got locked out? All kinds of colors turned themselves on, then it kept asking me if I wanted to change a function???? I kept saying no, then yes. It continued to ask. Turned off the computer and worried if I get my old stuff back. Today it is working but incoming mail is in the lower part of the screen, old mail is in the top. How do I go back to the old version. This is my desktop

I just turned on my laptop and it asked me to upgrade. NOPE! I've used you guys for years and only made a small donation, sorry. Didn't know you have an app for my Android??? Would have tried it. Does your browser follow and track me like Chrome, which I hate. I will aways speak well of you guys even if I can't go back to the older version. See ya, Randy
creator: Randyjohnjett

title: Side by side error
content: Hello. I am using Win11 and have been a Mozilla Thunderbird user for many years. Today I cannot open Thunderbird due to a "side-by-side" error. See image attached. I am not very computer savvy and therefor find some of the suggested solutions on the web rather difficult to understand and apply. I would appreciate any help you can be. Thanks, Murray Kerr, Auckland, NZ.
creator: MurrayKerr

title: Deleted mails
content: I use Thunderbird with IMAP configuration. In the last days, after deleting emails from the Inbox, they keep reappearing. I’ve tried deleting the "Deleted Items.msf" file in the imapMail folder, but it hasn’t solved the problem.
creator: rllata

title: How to remove menu items ?
content:
Hi. Same question as in https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1226211 : How can I customize the TB's main menu ?

I would like to remove menu items, which I never use:

  • for simplicity
  • to avoid accidental deletion (e.g. "delete folder", "delete message", "delete mail marked as junk in folder", etc.)

many thanks!
creator: welcome

title: FILTRO VELOCE lentissimo dopo ultimo aggiornamento
content:
Come da titolo il "filtro veloce" funziona a rilento dopo l'ultimo aggiornamento.

Il pc è abbastanza nuovo RAM 16Gb Win 11pro i7-10700CPU 2.90GHz

Il problema si manifesta nelle cartelle IMAP con un numero significativo di messaggi (10.000)
creator: kakainomane2013

title: INVIA A solo se crei la bozza
content:
Cliccando col tasto destro su "invia a" in Win10 Pro si apre il programma e posso compilare la mail con l'/gli allegati, ma non posso inviarla, devo prima chiuderla e chiedere di salvarla in "bozza", dopo di chè posso aprila dalla bozza ed inviarla. Qualcuno ha avuto lo stesso problema e l'ha risolto?

Right clicking on "send to" in Win10 Pro opens the program and I can compile the email with the attachment(s), but I can't send it, I have to close it first and ask to save it in "draft", after which I can open it from the draft and send it. Has anyone had the same problem and solved it?
creator: giuseppe6

title: Read mail showing as unread
content:
Hi,

I'm using the latest version of Thunderbird (128.2.0esr (64-bit)).

For some months I've been having a problem with some mail that I have read still showing as unread (bold). This happens whether I use the message pane or double-click to open the mail in a separate window.

Even if I then right-click on the email and select Mark > As read, the email initially shows as read, but a short time later it reverts to unread (bold).

I raised the issue with my email service provider and they say they only support web mail.

Any suggestions please?

Thanks!
creator: dhanslip

title: De Thunderbird mailbox is sinds een paar dagen heel erg verslechtert: veel trager geworden en men moet 2 of 3 maal overal op klikken vooraleer het programma reageert. Waarom alles steeds moeilijker, gecompliceerder, ingewikkelder maken ??
content: De Thunderbird mailbox is sinds een paar dagen heel erg verslechtert: veel trager geworden en men moet 2 of 3 maal overal op klikken vooraleer het programma reageert. Waarom alles steeds moeilijker, gecompliceerder, ingewikkelder maken ?? Het was zoveel beter vóór deze nieuwe versie !!!

title: regelafstand in mail
content:
Goedendag,

Graag verneem ik hoe ik in een bericht kan maken zonder dat ik na een enter, een lege regel krijg in mijn bericht, dus zoals in dit bericht. Voorbeeld; deze regel sluit keurig aan bovenstaande tekst na een Enter.

Ben zeer benieuwd !!

Met vriendelijke groet, Wilfried van der Laar [e-mailadres verwijderd omwille van de privacy]
